The program structure would be:

program main

    implicit none

    ! Read input string

    character(len=10000) :: input_str

    read(*,'(a)') input_str

    ! Process first step (File 1)

    integer :: score =0

    integer :: i

    character(len=1) :: my_char, his_char

    do i =1, len_trim(input_str)

        if (mod(i-1,2) ==0) then  ! even index (0-based)

            my_char = 'g'

        else

            my_char = 'p'

        end if

        his_char = input_str(i:i)

        if (my_char /= his_char) then

            if (my_char == 'p') then

                score = score +1

            else

                score = score -1

            end if

        end if

    end do

    ! Convert score to string str1

    character(len=20) :: str1

    write(str1, '(i0)') score

    str1 = adjustl(str1)

    ! Process second step (File 2)

    character(len=10000) :: s2_in, s2_modified

    s2_in = str1

    integer :: len_in, j

    s2_modified = ''

    j =1

    len_in = len_trim(s2_in)

    do while (j <= len_in)

        if (j < len_in) then

            if (s2_in(j:j) == 'B' .and. s2_in(j+1:j+1) == 'C') then

                s2_modified = s2_modified // 'D'

                j = j +2

            else

                s2_modified = s2_modified // s2_in(j:j)

                j = j +1

            end if

        else

            s2_modified = s2_modified // s2_in(j:j)

            exit

        end if

    end do

    ! Now process s2_modified to count A followed by D

    integer :: cnt =0, tmp=0

    character(len=1) :: c

    do i =1, len_trim(s2_modified)

        c = s2_modified(i:i)

        if (c == 'A') then

            tmp = tmp +1

        else if (c == 'D') then

            cnt = cnt + tmp

        else

            tmp =0

        end if

    end do

    ! Convert cnt to string str2

    character(len=20) :: str2

    write(str2, '(i0)') cnt

    str2 = adjustl(str2)

    ! Process third step (File 3)

    character(len=10000) :: s3_in, result_str

    s3_in = str2

    integer :: len_s3, k

    len_s3 = len_trim(s3_in)

    if (len_s3 ==0) then

        result_str = ''

    else

        result_str = s3_in(1:1)

        do k =2, len_s3

            character(len=1) :: current_char, previous_char

            current_char = s3_in(k:k)

            previous_char = s3_in(k-1:k-1)

            if (is_latin_letter(current_char)) then

                if (.not. is_latin_letter(previous_char)) then

                    result_str = trim(result_str) // ' '

                end if

                result_str = trim(result_str) // current_char

            else if (is_punctuation(current_char)) then

                result_str = trim(result_str) // current_char

            end if

        end do

    end if

    ! Output the result_str

    print *, trim(result_str)

contains

    logical function is_latin_letter(c)

        character(len=1), intent(in) :: c

        is_latin_letter = (c >= 'a' .and. c <= 'z')

    end function

    logical function is_punctuation(c)

        character(len=1), intent(in) :: c

        is_punctuation = (c == '.' .or. c == ',' .or. c == '!' .or. c == '?')

    end function

end program main
